raw_text: Dr. PREMATILAKE – KALUBOWILA (Loku Kalu) – It is with profound sadness that we inform the passing away of Dr. Prematilake Kalubowila (UK) while vacationing in Sri Lanka. Eldest son of late Seneris and Sathyadai Kalubowila of Weragala,​ Padukka,​ loving husband of Pushpa (nee Padmaperuma,​ UK),​ father to Samitha and Emma,​ Samali and Nicholas,​ Dasal and Ushma (all of UK),​ devoted grandfather to Nirodha,​ Asha,​ Sriya,​ Ameya,​ Nalalka,​ Dillon and Nairo,​ brother of Senerath (UK),​ late Shrimathi (Australia),​ late Subadra (Germany),​ and Tissa Kalubowila (Germany),​ loving brother-in law of Cyril,​ Thalatha,​ Ananda,​ Deepani,​ Gamini Padmaperuma,​ Chitra (USA) and Punya (Australia). Remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Directors on Elvitigala Mawatha,​ Colombo 8 from 10:00 a.m. – 8:00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 22nd of November 2023. As Loku Kalu’s wish,​ the body will be donated to Faculty of Medicine.076364
